title: We’re Not Going Back to Normal | Guests: Ben Dorr & Sara Brady | 4/23/20
description:
The plan was never to return to “normal.” Glenn breaks down “Event 201,” a war game held last October that knew the next pandemic could do what climate change never could: remold the world. And we’re seeing it right now. The head of the U.N.’s World Food Programme predicts a “famine of biblical proportions.” Kevin Freeman, host of BlazeTV’s “Economic War Room,” discusses safely restarting the economy on the county level. Political activist Ben Dorr breaks down why he’s helping organize shutdown protests and why the media fears him. Rabbi Daniel Lapin explains the Jewish 50-year Jubilee and if it could work to reset all debts today. Idaho mom Sara Brady recounts being arrested after taking her kids to a park. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
